name: FSCAET
short_description: Flight Safety Classification and Evaluation tool allows for evaluation of an airplane flight which is based on recorded data. The tool design is divided into five main parts: flight state classification, flight envelope (limits) tests, terrain collision determination, flight maneuver detection and airspace violation test. It provides a report describing the violated conditions of the flight. The library is extended by auxiliary functions for visualization of the recorded flight data. The evaluation tool is used together with full motion simulator depicted at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d8SQa9_el8k .
summary: Flight Safety Classification and Evaluation Tool
